Introduction to Statistical Learning

Statistical learning refers to a set of tools for making sense of complex data sets. In recent years, we have seen an increasing scale and scope of data collection across virtually all areas of science and industry. As a result, statistical learning has become a critical toolkit for anyone who wants to understand data ‚Äî and as more and more of today's jobs involve worked with data, this means that statistical learning is fast becoming a critical tool for everyone.
